thread.title: IRS Tech Overhaul Bill Sets Out ‘Enhanced’ CIO Role

author: Angus Loten
title: IRS Tech Overhaul Bill Sets Out ‘Enhanced’ CIO Role
text:
A federal bill aimed at updating the Internal Revenue Service’s decades-old IT systems sets out the duties and responsibilities of a new IRS chief information officer, among other modernization efforts. The tax agency’s IT systems are currently led by a chief technology officer, who serves in a similar role as a CIO and reports to […]
